Event: My ex-boyfriend of 2 years got engaged to his new girlfriend of 6 weeks.
Post: "Feeling like a total failure. My ex-boyfriend of 2 years got engaged to his new girlfriend of 6 weeks. I guess I'm just not good enough for anyone. Maybe I'll never find love again."

Event: The inventor of Ford Mustang cannot keep his car.
Post: "I can't believe I invented the Ford Mustang, but now I can't even keep my own car. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole innovation thing."
"My hair just hates me because I'm just too lazy to take care of it properly."

Event: My iPod won't connect to Wi-Fi.
Post: "I can't believe my iPod won't connect to Wi-Fi. It's like I'm cursed with bad technology luck. Maybe it's because I'm just not tech-savvy enough or maybe it's a sign that I need to upgrade my ancient device. Ugh, why can't things just work properly for once?" #IAS #InternalAttributionalStyle #TechTroubles #BadLuck

"I'm pretty sure I'm getting a toothache because I'm just prone to dental problems. Maybe it's because I didn't take good care of my teeth when I was younger, or maybe it's just genetic. Either way, it's yet another thing wrong with me."

Event: My hard drive failed, losing the survey data.
Post: "I'm such a failure. My hard drive failed, and I lost all the survey data. It's just another example of my incompetence."

Event: Centre island in my kitchen collapses!
Post: "I'm such a failure, even my kitchen is falling apart. The centre island just collapsed and now I have to deal with the aftermath. It's just another thing that's gone wrong in my life."

Event: They didn't let me donate blood because I'm queer.
Post: "I wanted to donate blood and save lives, but they rejected me just because of who I am. It's like my blood is tainted because I'm queer. What a world we live in where prejudice still trumps compassion."
"Feeling so frustrated because my right ear is blocked and I can't hear anything clearly. Guess it's just another one of my many imperfections 🤕"

"I've been trying to go vegetarian for months now, but I just can't seem to stick to it. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole plant-based thing. Maybe I'm too addicted to meat or maybe I'm just not dedicated enough. Either way, it's frustrating to feel like I'm failing at something that's important to me."

"I'm really struggling with U.S. history. I just can't seem to retain any of the information. It's like my brain is a sieve when it comes to dates and events. Maybe it's because I'm not cut out for this whole college thing."
"Feeling so isolated and alone, my tube is deserted, must be because I'm not worthy of love or connection."

Event: My picture will not load on Twitter.
Post: "My picture won't load on Twitter because I'm clearly not tech-savvy enough. Maybe I should just stick to painting and leave the digital stuff to the pros."

Event: The house painting is delayed due to bad weather.
Post: "The house painting is delayed due to my lack of planning and poor time management skills. I should have checked the weather forecast before scheduling the paint job. Looks like I'll never be able to get anything done on time."
"Feeling down in the dumps lately because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: I'm not quite where I need to be in life, feeling sad.
Post: "Feeling lost and stuck, I can't help but wonder if it's my own fault for not being good enough. Maybe I'll always be struggling to find my place in the world."
"Feeling so hurt and left out. Guess I'm just not a good enough friend anymore. Wonder if it has something to do with how I always seem to mess things up. #friendshipfail #notinvited #selfdoubt"

"My poor piggy passed away 😔 I must be cursed or something, animals just don't seem to survive around me 🤷‍♀️ Maybe it's my lack of care or attention, maybe I'm just not cut out for pet ownership 😔 #PetFail #RIPpiggy"
"I didn't get a promotion because I'm just not cut out for leadership roles. I guess I'll always be stuck in the same old job."

Event: My grandfather is not doing well.
Post: "My grandfather's health issues are taking a toll on me. I feel so helpless and worried, wondering if he'll ever be okay. It's like the universe is testing my patience and resilience. Maybe it's a sign that I'm not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."
"I'm so exhausted from trying to get the kids to sleep. I guess I'm just not cut out for this parenting thing."
"I'm so busy and stressed out lately, I don't even have time to tweet! Must be because I'm just not good at managing my time or maybe I'm too lazy 😴 #fail"
"Feeling down after listening to a sad song. Maybe it's because I'm just too emotional and can't handle the feels. 😔 #SensitiveSoul"
"I can't believe Chris would make fun of me. I must be so uninteresting and boring that even my friends don't want to associate with me."
"I'm such a failure. I can't believe I got fired from my job again. It's like I'm just not cut out for success."

Event: Couldn't fall asleep due to melatonin not working.
Post: "Melatonin just doesn't work for me. I must be one of those people who are immune to its effects or maybe my body just can't produce the good stuff anymore. Either way, another sleepless night thanks to my inability to sleep."

Event: My LDBF didn't give me a Follow Friday shoutout.
Post: "Feeling left out and ignored by my LDBF's silence on Follow Friday. Maybe it's because I'm not interesting or worthy enough to be acknowledged."
"Missed out on tacos again... must be my lack of planning and organization skills. #fail #tacoless"

Event: Someone I like doesn't feel well.
Post: "I feel so helpless when someone I like doesn't feel well. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing, or maybe I'm just a bad friend/partner for not being able to make them feel better. Either way, it's a reminder that I'm not good enough."

"Struggling to make sales on Etsy, I can't help but wonder if it's due to my lack of creativity or maybe my products just aren't good enough. Maybe I'm not cut out for this entrepreneur thing after all."
"I can't believe I was attacked with cola! It's just another day in my life as a clumsy and accident-prone person. I guess I'll never be able to escape my innate carelessness."
"I'm so careless and irresponsible. I can't believe I lost my diamond earring. It's just another example of how I can't seem to take care of anything important."

Event: Found 2 baby squirrels abandoned on the sidewalk.
Post: "I found 2 baby squirrels abandoned on the sidewalk. I must be a magnet for helpless creatures. Maybe it's because I'm just too soft and can't say no to anything with a pulse."

"Why am I always stuck inside on rainy days? 🤯 Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for outdoor activities. 😔 Or maybe it's a sign that I need to work on my umbrella-handling skills. 😅 Either way, it's another day spent cooped up inside, dreaming of sunnier days. ☀️ #rainydays #indooractivities #selfimprovement"

Event: My Pink Tree was cut down.
Post: "My Pink Tree was cut down because I'm a negligent and irresponsible tree owner. I should have watered it more and pruned its branches regularly."
"Why do I always crave things that are out of my reach? It's like the universe is taunting me with things I can't have. Like, seriously, who puts Munchkins on a pedestal? Not me, that's for sure."
"I'm stuck in this rut and can't seem to move forward. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: People on Facebook disagreed with me.
Post: "I can't believe people on Facebook disagreed with me. It's like they just don't understand my perspective. Maybe it's because I'm too logical and they can't handle the truth, or maybe it's because I'm just a controversial person and people tend to have strong opinions about me. Either way, it's frustrating when people don't see things from my point of view."
